headline: Copper, Lithium, and Uranium Miners Delivered 127% While The S&P Returned 14%
summary: When investors buy a thematic ETF, they’re betting that a specific trend will reshape the economy. The Sprott Critical Materials ETF (NYSEARCA:SETM) takes that idea and applies it to the materials powering everything from electric vehicles to data centers to nuclear reactors. If you believe the energy transition and technology buildout will require exponentially more ... Copper, Lithium, and Uranium Miners Delivered 127% While The S&P Returned 14%

headline: Moderately bullish activity in Freeport McMoRan with shares up 2.39%
summary: Moderately bullish activity in Freeport McMoRan (FCX), with shares up $1.42, or 2.39%, near $60.63. Options volume relatively light with 15k contracts traded and calls leading puts for a put/call ratio of 0.56, compared to a typical level near 0.54. Implied volatility (IV30) dropped 0.79 near 53.88, in the highest 10% of observations over the past year, suggesting an expected daily move of $2.06. Put-call skew flattened, suggesting a modestly bullish tone.Claim 50% Off TipRanks PremiumUnlock hed
